short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you convert epoch time easier with a Chrome Extension, just click and convert

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Time Extension
Easy Time Extension is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to simplify time conversion. With this extension, you can effortlessly convert UTC or epoch timestamps into human-readable date and time formats. Whether you're a developer, analyst, or anyone dealing with time data, this extension ensures quick and accurate conversions, saving you time and effort.
